name: A Debt to Time

objectives.desc: Investigate the death of a memory tech addict.
Locate the merchant selling pre-war memory recordings.
Question the merchant about the death.
Talk to addicted customers to understand the appeal.
Decide what to do about the memory trade.

memory_tech_info.function: Allows users to experience pre-war memories through brainwave recordings
risks: Memory confusion (can't distinguish own memories from recordings)
Emotional trauma from experiencing others' deaths
memory_tech_info.appeal: Escape harsh wasteland reality, experience pre-war comfort and safety

expose_merchant.desc: Expose the merchant's illegal operation to the authorities and their customers.

consequences.outcome: The merchant is arrested. Addicts riot in protest. The memory devices are confiscated. Some customers die from withdrawal.

spare_for_access.desc: Spare the merchant in exchange for exclusive access to the memory technology.

consequences.outcome: The merchant continues operating. You gain access to rare pre-war memories. More people will die, but you have what you wanted.

destroy_technology.desc: Destroy all memory devices and technology to prevent further deaths.

consequences.outcome: The technology is destroyed. Addicts are devastated but alive. The merchant escapes. Pre-war memories are lost forever.

take_over_business.desc: Kill the merchant and take over the profitable memory trade yourself.

consequences.outcome: You profit from addiction. The business thrives under new management. Your conscience withers like the wasteland.

notes: A quest exploring addiction, escapism, and the ethics of profiting from others' desperation in the wasteland.
